name: Far Woods
description:
Short and simple platforming game. Part of project for 2D Game Development.

Take control of a child lost in woods, far from home. Avoid the nasty local flora and fauna, gather ancient keys to unlock route forward and find your way back home.

Controls: WASD/Arrow keys to move, Shift to run, Space/Up to jump.

(Some cheats included: Hold G in main menu to acquire unlimited lives; Hold number 1-3 to warp to corresponding level)
